S

savedGameExists() - Static method in class model.BattleshipModel
Returns true if it detects a ".dat" file that matches the default filename.
saveGame() - Method in class model.BattleshipModel
Saves the current BattleshipModel object and all its content into a ".dat" binary file.
setAllComponents() - Method in class view.BattlePanel
Utility method used to fill the BattlePanel with sub-panels and JButton grids.
setAllComponents() - Method in class view.SetShipsPanel
Whenever the SetShipsPanel is accessed, all of its components are set.
setButtonGrid() - Method in class view.SetShipsPanel
Creates and adds a JButton grid as big as the game size to the main panel.
setButtonsPanel() - Method in class view.BattlePanel
Creates and fills a JPanel with a JButton and two JLabels for win/loss conditions.
setComputer(Computer) - Method in class model.BattleshipModel
Sets the Computer of the BattleshipModel object.
setCurrentTime(long) - Method in class view.CountdownPanel
Sets the current time (initialization time minus time passed from the start of the count down).
setDropDownAndButtonsPanel() - Method in class view.SetShipsPanel
Creates and adds a panel with two JComboBoxes and some JButtons.
setGameSize(int) - Method in class model.BattleshipModel
Sets the game size of the current Battleship match.
setHitsGrid() - Method in class view.BattlePanel
Sets all the components to create the hits grid, where the user can see its fired hits.
setInitialShipsGrid(boolean[][]) - Method in class model.Player
Initializes a boolean grid with the position of set Ships marked as false and free cells marked as true, copying it from an existing boolean grid.
setName(String) - Method in class model.Player
Sets the name of the Player.
setPlayer(Player) - Method in class model.BattleshipModel
Sets the Player of the BattleshipModel object.
setPlayerState(PlayerState) - Method in class model.BattleshipModel
Sets the current state of the Player.
setSecs(long) - Method in class model.BattleshipModel
Sets the seconds that remain to the countdown.
setShip(int, int, int, ShipDirection) - Method in class model.Player
Sets a single Player's Ship onto the Player's game grid.
setShip(int, int, ShipDirection, boolean[][]) - Method in class model.Ship
A method for assigning an absolute position to a Ship object and then positioning it onto a Player's ships grid.
setShipOnShipsGrid(boolean[][]) - Method in class model.Ship
Overlaps the Ship's absolute position to the Player's game grid to set the Ship on it.
SetShipsController - Class in controller
Controller for a SetShipsPanel.

setShipsGrid() - Method in class view.BattlePanel
Sets all the components to create the ships grid, where the user can see its ships.
SetShipsPanel - Class in view
Class that represents the phase of setting ships onto the Battleship grid.

Sets the current state of the BattleshipModel.
setState(PlayerState) - Method in class model.Player

setTime(long) - Method in class view.CountdownPanel
Sets the time of initialization.
setTimed(boolean, int) - Method in class model.BattleshipModel
Sets the timer of a BattleshipModel object.
setTimedOut(boolean) - Method in class model.Player
Set if the Player's timer has run out.
setTimer(long) - Method in class view.BattlePanel
Sets a Timer held in CountdownPanel with an amount of seconds.
setTimer(Timer) - Method in class view.CountdownPanel
Sets the stored Timer.
setTimer(ActionListener) - Method in class view.CountdownPanel
Sets an ActionListener to listen to the actions fired by the stored timer.
Ship - Class in model
Class that represents a Ship entity, holding its absolute position and its characteristics (type, length, direction).

Constructor for the class Ship.
ShipDirection - Enum in utils
Utility Enum containing the two possible directions a Ship object can have.

Utility Class containing every Ship length in primitive integer constants

shipsLeft() - Method in class model.Player

smartHit(PlayerState) - Method in class model.Computer
